title: Decatur Heritage Starts Fast, Finishes Strong in 57-12 Win
content:
[ooyala code="Y5NXZndzo0b_W5KmdRWgKpgexAJvSd42" player_id="725383065a3c4c6a8e6c9b813bd1b5df" width="640" height="360" auto="true"]

Priceville, Ala. (WHNT) Decatur Heritage improves to 2-1 with a 57-12 win over Waterloo on Thursday night. Here are the rest of the scores from around Alabama Thursday.

Class 7A
Central-Phenix City 39, Lee-Montgomery 20
Jeff Davis 36, Auburn 35
Class 6A
Dothan 35, Stanhope Elmore 14
Class 1A
Decatur Heritage 57, Waterloo 12
